title: nuzur
author: nuzur
created_time: November 10, 2023, 11:28:24 PMLast edit: November 11, 2023, 06:58:07 AM by nuzur
content: Hello friends; I have Btc Fantom and Aave Fantom in my trust account.I want to buy USDT or Dogecoin by exchanging them.Swap companies ask for very high commissions to make these transactions (%90).Does anyone know how I can translate it without doing too much damage?I will give a cash reward to anyone who helps me lose less.wallet pictures:

comments.author: Makus
comments.body: Op it might seem you are looking for a way to get answers but the truth is you bringing extra damage to yourself, it has been advise that we shouldn't post our financial information online especially the amount of asset you're holding, as it might attract some hacker and scammer to our life including some armed robbers, just take a good look at this thread and see what a person got from displaying so many financial information online "Demystifying living a private life and your bitcoin" so I'll recommend you delete the two images displaying your financial information, its for your own safety.

comments.author: nuzur
comments.body: Thank you for your valuable warning. I removed the wallet pictures.
